table.name: vtiger_osspaymentsout
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_osspaymentsout` ( `osspaymentsoutid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `paymentsvalue` DECIMAL(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentsno` VARCHAR(32) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentsname` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentstitle` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentscurrency` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `bank_account` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `osspaymentsout_status` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `relatedid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `salesid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `parentid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`osspaymentsoutid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_osspaymentsout` FOREIGN KEY (`osspaymentsoutid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_crmentity` (`crmid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_osspaymentsoutcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_osspaymentsoutcf` ( `osspaymentsoutid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`osspaymentsoutid`), CONSTRAINT `fk_1_vtiger_osspaymentsoutcf` FOREIGN KEY (`osspaymentsoutid`) REFERENCES `vtiger_osspaymentsout` (`osspaymentsoutid`) ON DELETE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
